title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: In the casting, an "L" had obviouslybeen substituted for a " D." There is no kirkknown as Lochar in Scotland, and the chapel ofDeuchar or Dochar stood hard by. The Murrayswere the lairds of Deuchar; and on the principalchurch being removed from St Mary's, and thechapel at Deuchar suppressed, the bell seems tohave been transferred from the one to the other.
